titleStmt.title: Upon the joyfull and welcome return of His Sacred Majestie, Charls the Second, of England, Scotland, France and Ireland King, defender of the faith, &c. to his due and indubitate right of government, over these His Majestie's kingdoms and dominions. A panegyrick. By Tho. Mayhew, Gent.
titleStmt.author: Mayhew, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Abel Roper, at the Sun in Fleet-street over against St. Dunstans Church,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Sun in Fleet-street over against St. Dunstans Church
